author: Warhammer
description:
The battlefields of Warhammer 40,000 are filled with varied landscapes and settings to choose from to base your armies! With the release of the new all-plastic Krieg, we couldn’t pass up the opportunity to show you how to go about basing this new army, and theming it around their favourite battleground – muddy trenches! Follow Dan on his adventure into bulking up these bases using the leftover frames and bits from the kit, plus a few skulls for good measure!

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/

- Get Warhammer in your inbox: https://ow.ly/6SJq50T3NL1
title: How To Build & Paint: War-Torn Bases for Death Korps of Krieg | Intermediate | Warhammer 40,000
